solution_line_template: {total_nuggets} nuggets = A (how many Alyssa ate) + {keely_ate_multiple}A (how many Keely ate) + {kendall_ate_multiple_as_written}A (how many Kendall ate) or {total_nuggets} = A + {keely_ate_multiple}A + {kendall_ate_multiple_as_written}A which is {total_nuggets} = {total_equation_coefficient}A
Then we will divide each side by {divisor} to figure out how many nuggets Alyssa ate, {total_nuggets}/{divisor} = {divisor}A/{divisor} or {alyssa_nuggets} = A.
